messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the implementation of deleteProduct (paths relative to the project root):

- controllers/productController.js

Explanation
- The route file you provided (routes/productRoutes.js) imports deleteProduct from ../controllers/productController.js and uses it for DELETE /:id.
- I searched the codebase for occurrences of "deleteProduct" and found the actual handler implementation in controllers/productController.js. There are no other files that implement deleteProduct.
- In controllers/productController.js the deleteProduct handler:
  - Looks up the product by req.params.id (Product.findById),
  - If found, deletes it (Product.deleteOne) and responds with { message: 'Product removed' },
  - If not found, responds with 404 and throws "Product not found".
- Commands used to confirm this (run in the project workspace):
  - grep -R "deleteProduct" -n ..
  - sed -n '1,240p' ../backend/controllers/productController.js

If you want, I can also include the exact code snippet or the route -> handler mapping in the OpenAPI spec.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
